mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, TITLE, c.USER_NO, GUEST_NO, USER_NICK OTHER_NICKNAME, IMAGE, LAST_CHAT FROM CHAT_ROOM c JOIN "USER" u ON (c.GUEST_NO = u.USER_NO) WHERE c.USER_NO = #{nowUser} AND STATUS = 'Y' UNION SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, TITLE, c.USER_NO, GUEST_NO, USER_NICK OTHER_NICKNAME, IMAGE, LAST_CHAT FROM CHAT_ROOM c JOIN "USER" u ON (c.USER_NO = u.USER_NO) WHERE c.GUEST_NO = #{nowUser} AND STATUS = 'Y' MINUS SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, TITLE, cr.USER_NO, GUEST_NO, USER_NICK OTHER_NICKNAME, IMAGE, LAST_CHAT FROM CHAT_ROOM cr JOIN "USER" u ON (cr.USER_NO = u.USER_NO) WHERE STATUS = #{nowUser} ORDER BY LAST_CHAT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE VALUES(CHAT_MSG_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chatRoomNo}, #{msg}, SYSDATE, ${sessionUserNo}, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, MESSAGE, USER_NO, CHAT_STATUS FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} AND CHAT_STATUS != #{loginUserNo} ORDER BY CHAT_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_ROOM SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE (CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} OR CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNoSub}) AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND STATUS = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NICK FROM "USER" WHERE USER_NO = (SELECT GUEST_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo})
SELECT STATUS FROM CHAT_ROOM WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_ROOM SET STATUS = #{loginUserNo} WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
UPDATE CHAT_ROOM SET LAST_CHAT = SYSDATE WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
UPDATE CHAT_ROOM SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo}
